Choreography [i](Then you may exile this spell card taught to a creature you control. Whenever that creature attacks, you may cast a copy of this spell. You still pay its costs.)[/i]
Sacrifice this creature: Legendary permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Choose target creature you control. “Larger than Life” deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets, where X is the chosen creature's power.

cards.special_text:
Whenever a player draws a card, they lose 1 life.
[+1]: Target player draws two cards, then discards a card.
[-2]: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Return up to one target creature or planeswalker card with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it.
Exile up to one target instant or sorcery card with mana value X or less from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

cards.rules_text:
As this artifact enters, choose a card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name cost {3} more to activate unless they're mana abilities.
Whenever a triggered ability of a source an opponent controls with the chosen name triggers, counter it unless its controller pays {3}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a multicolored spell, activate an ability of a multicolored permanent, or pay a cost that contains {V}.

Nonbasic lands lose all other types and abilities and gain “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.”
{W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: This creature gets +5/+5 and gains indestructible until end of turn.

cards.special_text:
If Cassia would leave the battlefield due to having 0 loyalty counters on her, instead she becomes a 3/3 creature.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.
[-2]: Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
For each player, choose a creature or planeswalker they control. The chosen permanents gain indestructible until end of turn. Then destroy all creatures and planeswalkers.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever this creature enters or attacks, you may pay {V}{V}{V}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it. [i](Spend a different color of mana on each {V}.)[/i]
Multicolored permanents you control have ward {1}.

Vigilance
When this creature enters, reveal the top seven cards of your library. You may put a planeswalker card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
Whenever this creature attacks, you may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control an additional time this turn.

Menace
When this creature enters, target opponent chooses three. They may choose the same mode more than once.
• They lose 3 life and you gain 3 life.
• They discard a card and you draw a card.
• They sacrifice a creature and you return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

Flying
When this creature enters, build hype. [i](Create a tapped 3/2 red Fan creature token. Put two stun counters on it. If it would become untapped, remove a stun counter from it instead.)[/i]
Whenever you put one or more stun counters on a permanent, draw a card.

Whenever you attack with one or more nontoken creatures, create a 1/1 white creature token that's tapped and attacking.
Whenever you attack, tokens you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

Ward–Pay 3 life
At the beginning of your end step, put a reprise counter on this creature, then return up to one target nonland permanent card with mana value equal to the number of reprise counters on this creature from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Whenever you put a +1/+1 counter on an offstage creature you control, you may have that creature take the stage. [i](Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control takes the stage, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

This creature enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. If you spent four or more colors of mana to cast it, it enters with twice X +1/+1 counters on it instead.
When this creature enters, it fights up to one target creature an opponent controls.

Reach
When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter on it.
{1}, Sacrifice a creature: Remove all counters from target creature or planeswalker.
At the beginning of your end step, discard two cards. If you do search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
For each card in your hand, discard it or put it on top of your library. Exchange your library and graveyard. Shuffle. Draw seven cards.
Exile “Immortal”.

cards.special_text:
Legendary creatures you control have menace.
[+1]: Up to one target creature you control that isn't onstage takes the stage. [i](Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]
[-2]: Nekaru deals damage equal to the number of legendary permanents you control to any target.
[-5]: Search your library for two legendary cards with different names, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle. Discard a random card.
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary sorcery only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste and takes the stage. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step. [i](Onstage creatures are legendary, get +1/+1, and must be blocked before offstage creatures if able.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
You may cast legendary spells as though they had flash.
Whenever you cast a legendary instant or legendary sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.rules_text2:
[i](You may cast a legendary instant only if you control a legendary creature or planeswalker.)[/i]
Target player builds hype three times. [i](They create three tapped 3/2 red Fan creature tokens and put two stun counters on each of them.)[/i]
Tap target permanent. Move any number of stun counters from among permanents you control onto that permanent.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, they choose 1 or {2}, then create that many 1/1 black Noble creature tokens. Then if there are seven or more Nobles on the battlefield, you draw a card and sacrifice this enchantment and that player sacrifices all Nobles they control and loses 7 life.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of a random Prismavision contestant. [i](Prismavision contestants are the legendary creatures and planeswalkers in this set.)[/i]

{T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Once during each of your turns, you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost if it has four or more mana symbols in its mana cost and its mana value is less than or equal to the number of lands you control.

Vigilance, menace, ward {1}
{V}{V}{V}: Put three +1/+1 counters on this creature. Draw a card for each time this ability has resolved this turn. Activate only if this creature entered this turn. [i](Spend a different color of mana on each {V}.)[/i]
